apE#taq vItaq vi ca# sarpaqtAtOq yE&traq stha pu#rAqNA yE caq nUta#nAH | 
adA#diqdaM ~MyaqmO#&vaqsAna#M pRuthiqvyA akra#nniqmaM piqtarO# lOqkama#smai || 
aqgnErBasmA$syaqgnEH purI#Shamasi saqj~jAMna#masi kAmaqdhara#NaqM mayi# tE 
kAmaqdhara#NaM BUyAt || 
saM ~MyA va#H priqyAstaqnuvaqH saM priqyA hRuda#yAni vaH | 
AqtmA vO astuq - [  ] 14
